text: Francesco Nucara (3 April 1940 â€“ 12 May 2022) was an Italian politician. He was born in Reggio Calabria, Italy. He was a member of the Italian Republican Party. Nucara was the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 until 1994 and again from 2006 until 2013. Nucara died on 12 May 2022 in Rome, Italy at the age of 82.Pri: morto Francesco Nucara, segretario dal 2001 al 2017 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Calabria Category:People from Reggio Calabria
title: Francesco Nucara
